# Load data into a pandas dataframe
data_df = pd.read_csv('https://vtndatascience.co.uk/data/Example_Veracity_Data_Anonymised.csv')
data_df.shape

2:
columns_to_plot = ["totalVisitTime", "pagesViewedInVisit", "totalActionsCount"]
for column in columns_to_plot: 
    plt.hist(data_df[column], bins=100)
    plt.title(f'Histogram of {column}')
    plt.xlabel(f'{column}')
    plt.ylabel('Frequency')
    plt.show()
